For Researchers

Publications

  • DBToaster: Higher-order Delta Processing for Dynamic, Frequently Fresh Views.
    Yanif Ahmad, Oliver Kennedy, Christoph Koch, and Milos Nikolic
    Proc. VLDB 2012, Istanbul, Turkey.
  • DBToaster: Agile Views in a Dynamic Data Management System.
    Oliver Kennedy, Yanif Ahmad and Christoph Koch
    Proc. CIDR 2011, Monterey, California.
  • Incremental Query Evaluation in a Ring of Databases.
    Christoph Koch
    Proc. PODS 2010, Indianapolis, Indiana.
  • DBToaster: A SQL Compiler for High-Performance Delta Processing in Main-Memory Databases.
    Yanif Ahmad and Christoph Koch
    Proc. VLDB 2009, Demo paper.
